actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution to the constitutional amendment to preserve the concept of neighborhood schools.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that the right of citizens to attend the public schools of their choice shall not be abridged or denied by the United States or by any State on account of race, color, religion, or national origin.

titles.title: A joint resolution to the constitutional amendment to preserve the concept of neighborhood schools.
